name: Christmas Cards - 6 pack Blue
description:
This is the Blue pack of 6 individually illustrated cards from the "12 Beards of Christmas" card series designed by London based studio Sane & Able. These are bespoke designed Christmas cards based on the 12 days of Christmas theme but with a more hairy take on tradition.

This pack contains 6 individually illustrated beard cards:
The Schnauzer
The Shoeshiner
The Eclipse
The Pothole
The Scarf
The Dreamer

Each limited edition pack includes 6 cards and 6 manilla envelopes. The cards are printed onto 350gsm 100% recycled Evolution card.

name: Christmas Cards - 6 pack Red
description:
This is the red pack of 6 individually illustrated cards from the "12 Beards of Christmas" card series designed by London based studio Sane & Able. These are bespoke designed Christmas cards based on the 12 days of Christmas theme but with a more hairy take on tradition.

This pack contains 6 individually illustrated beard cards:
The Pretzel
The Inversion
The Smuggler
The Shredder
The Monocle
The Brace

Each limited edition pack includes 6 cards and 6 manilla envelopes. The cards are printed onto 350gsm 100% recycled Evolution card.

name: Christmas Cards - Red & Blue pack (12 cards)
description:
This is the Complete set of 12 individually illustrated cards from the "12 Beards of Christmas" card series designed by London based studio Sane & Able. These are bespoke designed Christmas cards based on the 12 days of Christmas theme but with a more hairy take on tradition.

The series is made up of 2 packs of 6 cards, the red pack and the blue pack.

The 'Red' contains 6 individually illustrated beard cards: 
The Schnauzer 
The Shoeshiner 
The Eclipse 
The Pothole 
The Scarf 
The Dreamer

The 'Blue' contains 6 individually illustrated beard cards: 
The Pretzel 
The Inversion 
The Smuggler 
The Shredder 
The Monocle 
The Brace

Each limited edition pack includes 6 cards and 6 manilla envelopes - a total of 12 cards and 12 envelopes. The cards are printed onto 350gsm 100% recycled Evolution card.
